amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to create a grant program for States, local governments, Indian tribes, and domestic violence victim service providers and coalitions for technical assistance and training in the operation or establishment of a lethality assessment program (LAP).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
